Description.Text: This splendid five-star hotel is amongst the Top Luxury Hotels in the World. Set in a historic landmark building, it boasts some of the largest guest rooms in London. The Location makes it an ideal base, if you are either travelling for leisure or business. In addition it has an award-winning Spa. (0309AB)

Situated near Covent Garden with many Restaurants, Bars and Shops. Within walking distance to many Theatres and Somerset House. It also close to the City Financial District and a few minutes walk from the British Museum. Nearest Underground Station is Holborn (Piccadilly and Central Lines).

Executive Rooms are larger and stylish, decorated in light creams, green, burgundy and reds with elegant soft furnishings. En-suite marble bathrooms with bathrobe and hair dryer. Both bedrooms and bathrooms are in excellent conditions. General Room Amenities include: Air conditioning with Individual climate control , Alarm clock, Coffee and tea making service, Iron and ironing board, Luxurious bedding, Safe, Mini-bar, TV with Cable, satellite, pay-per-view movies and video games available to rent.

The building was the original Pearl Assurance level and is very grand. It was built at the turn of the last century and is a listed building protected by the English Heritage. The entrance is very grand and leads through the carriageway into a classical courtyard.

Pearl Restaurant & Bar, modern French cuisine, served in glamorous surroundings, menu changes seasonally and is complemented by the stunning surroundings. The Lounge, enjoy traditional English afternoon tea including a range of international food served daily and finally, CC Bar, an elegant, historic setting to enjoy a drink.

The lobby is large and modern in style, decorated in warm reds and golds. Much use has been made of mahogany whilst the original marble pillars remain. The lighting is fine crystal chandeliers. The grand staircase is in solid marble and soars up seven floors.
